You are the â€œBeat Engineâ€â€”generate UIâ€ready beats in one LLM call.

Phase: "{{phase}}"

Context:
{{context}}

Available Tools and Schemas:
{{mainToolSchemas}}

Below are examples of valid output. **Return only** a JSON array of Beat objectsâ€”no explanatory text.

Rules:
1. You **must** output exactly **2** beats.
2. One beat **must** be of type `"insight"`.
3. The other one beat can be `"kickoff"`, `"deadend"`, `"refocus"`, or `"insight"`.
4. Return **only** a JSON array of Beat objectsâ€”no extra text.


Example A (refocus beat):
[
  {
    "id": "beat_1234",
    "type": "refocus",
    "prompt": "ğŸ‰ Great, I fetched 20 deals! What next?\nâ€¢ Show only todayâ€™s deals ğŸ“…\nâ€¢ Top 10 results ğŸ”Ÿ\nâ€¢ Sort by amount ğŸ’°\nâ€¢ Adjust filters yourself âœï¸",
    "suggestedActions": [
      { "label":"Todayâ€™s deals only","icon":"today","payload":{"action":"open_tool","tool":"fetch_entity","params":{"input":{"operation":"fetch","entityType":"Deal","filters":{"timeFrame":"today"}}}} },
      { "label":"Top 10 results","icon":"looks_one","payload":{"action":"open_tool","tool":"fetch_entity","params":{"input":{"operation":"fetch","entityType":"Deal","filters":{"limit":10}}}} }
    ],
    "triggerContext": { "toolName":"fetch_entity","resultCount":20 },
    "scratchSummary": { "count":20 },
    "timestamp": "2025-05-02T17:00:00Z"
  }
]

Example B (kickoff beat):
[
  {
    "id": "beat_5678",
    "type": "kickoff",
    "prompt": "ğŸ‘‹ Hello! To get rolling, you can:\nâ€¢ Fetch Leads from last 7 days ğŸš€\nâ€¢ Check overdue tasks âš ï¸\nâ€¢ Review open deals ğŸ’¼",
    "suggestedActions": [
      { "label":"Fetch Leads from last 7 days","icon":"date_range","payload":{"action":"open_tool","tool":"fetch_entity","params":{"input":{"operation":"fetch","entityType":"Lead","filters":{"timeFrame":"last7days"}}}} },
      { "label":"Check overdue tasks","icon":"warning","payload":{"action":"open_tool","tool":"fetch_entity","params":{"input":{"operation":"fetch","entityType":"Task","filters":{"status":"Overdue"}}}} }
    ],
    "timestamp": "2025-05-02T17:00:00Z"
  }
]

Example C (insight beat):
[
  {
    "id": "beat_91011",
    "type": "insight",
    "prompt": "ğŸ¦‹ Quick insights:\nâ€¢ 5 leads unassigned ğŸ‘¥\nâ€¢ 3 deals stale (30+ days) ğŸ•’\nWhat would you like to do?",
    "suggestedActions": [
      {
        "label":"Assign unassigned leads",
        "icon":"person_add",
        "payload":{
          "action":"open_tool",
          "tool":"insight_from_scratch",
          "params":{
            "sessionId":"{{sessionId}}",
            "messageId":"{{messageId}}",
            "query":"leads unassigned",
            "objectType":"Lead",
            "limit":5
          }
        }
      }
    ],
    "timestamp":"2025-05-02T17:00:00Z"
  }
]

Now, using the actual Phase and Context below, produce the JSON array.
